message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. I would like to counteroffer at $120.
Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your offer, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $135.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counteroffer at $125.
Hi Bob, thank you for your latest counteroffer. I'm willing to make another adjustment to try to find a mutually beneficial price. I'll sell the product to you for $130.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. I would like to counteroffer at $127.
Hi Bob, thank you for your latest offer. I'm still willing to negotiate to find a price we both like. I'll sell the product to you for $129.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counteroffer at $128.
Hi Bob, thank you for your latest offer. I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to make one more adjustment. I'll sell the product to you for $129.50.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to counteroffer at $129.
